entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
